ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 128
ygData.msgSnippet: Well when you start to reach high levels your going to find soloing close to impossible at 30+. Personally I m already putting my level 37 Necromancer on hold
ygData.messageBody:
Well when you start to reach high levels your going to find soloing close to
impossible at 30+. Personally I'm already putting my level 37 Necromancer on
hold for a bit and playing a Dwarven Paladin full time. Besides which I'm
kind of bored with casting a dot or two then medding when grouping.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN <FletcherNL@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 12:00 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 128


>From: "Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN" <FletcherNL@...>
>
>I was wondering what the consensus on the upcoming nerf/patch to the DoT
>spells is among other necros. Personally, I'm f'n outraged about it. I
>might even have to start playing another class if they mess it up bad
>enough. I just hit lv 20 and they pull this stuff. We're being penalized
>for soloing, yet necromancers are a solitary class, practically useless in
>groups. (unless you're fighting undead) Verant needs to hear our voices on
>this. If kiting is the problem, then why not change one spell (SoW)
instead
>of a whole line of spells that make up the bulk of our offense?
>
>Phrost
>Cazic-Thule
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>ONElist: your connection to online communities.
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
